episodios.nome: Formulas for the Moon and Stars

metadata_completo.titulo_ingles: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You - High School Days
metadata_completo.sinopse:
Nasa, at the request of his former junior high school teacher, Ms. Yanagi, finds himself entrusted with teaching a programming class at a high school. But here's the catchâ€”it's an all-girls' school. Surrounded by the limitless energy of teenage girls, Nasa tries to maintain his composure, but deep down, he can't help feeling nervous.

A capricious boyfriend, secret admiration for someone, and a multitude of romantic dilemmas that can't be solved by programming, Nasa wonders if he can crack the equation of love!

(Source: MAL News)
